-from abc import ABC, abstractmethod%0A%0Aclass Animal(ABC):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        self.nome = nome%0A%0A    def apresentarNome(self):%0A        print(f%22Eu sou um(a) %7Bself.nome%7D!%22)%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def fazerSom(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def mover(self):%0A        pass%0A

@@ -309,1116 +309,4 @@
     
-%0A    %0Aclass Leao(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def fazerSom(self):%0A        print(%22Som: ROAARRR!%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22Movimento: Correndo rapidamente sobre quatro patas.%22)%0A%0A%0Aclass Elefante(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def fazerSom(self):%0A        print(%22Som: FUUUUUUUM! (Tromba)!%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22Movimento: Caminhando lentamente%22)%0A%0A%0Aclass Cobra(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def fazerSom(self):%0A        print(%22Som: Tsssssss!%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22Movimento: Rastejando pelo ch%C3%A3o.%22)%0A%0Adef apresentar(animal: Animal):%0A    print(%22-%22 * 30)%0A    print(f%22Classe: %7Btype(animal).__name__%7D%22)%0A%0A    animal.apresentarNome()%0A    animal.fazerSom()%0A    animal.mover%0A%0A%0Aif __name__ == %22__main__%22:%0A    simba = Leao(%22Simba%22)%0A    dumbo = Elefante(%22Dumbo%22)%0A    nagini = Cobra(%22Nagini%22)%0A%0A    zoologico = %5Bsimba, dumbo, nagini%5D%0A%0A    print(%22--- VISITANDO O ZOOL%C3%93GICO ---%22)%0A    %0A    for bicho in zoologico:%0A        apresentar(bicho)
